|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/16/2015 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 0XM-00EW-00001 |asin = B01EA8ZUZW |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "7601RC1 V1.2" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
This device is intended to be used with an IP Phone to give it Wi-Fi access.
==Links of Interest== [https://www.yealink.com/upfiles/products/201708/1501579834820.pdf Datasheet]
